Logická hra, třeba zapojit mozek. Nejvíce mě bavila s přáteli :)

Portal 2 não apresenta mudanças consideráveis em relação ao Portal 1, o gráfico continua bonito e o enredo bom acompanhado de uma incrível trilha sonora.Os Puzzles são bons, com algumas fazes que lhe farão realmente quebrar a cabeça e passar algum tempo tentando resolver os problemas que as câmaras trazem para o jogador.Tão bom quanto Portal 1, eu recomendo este jogo.

想象一下，4、5个人的大学寝室，你的室友要么在山口山世界中组队厮杀，在DOTA人海中突围，或在《使命召唤：黑色行动》的枪林弹雨中英勇冲锋，而你呢？你手握一把看似蟹抓的奇葩武器在墙上到处打洞，然后在空中模仿超人或者蜘蛛侠。在休战间隙室友们跑到你屏幕跟前，异口同声地——“哇！！！”，然后嘴一抿，头一摆，回到各自电脑面前，继续战斗。对于这个没爆炸、没子弹、没死尸、没血浆，几乎什么都没有对话却比什么都多的游戏，你身经百战的室友怎么可能喜欢。然则对你而言，一切都无妨，因为你玩的很开心，我是说，相当相当的开心。至少我是这样。

This game is one much unlike others. It is a puzzle game, yet a game with a story line. Portal 2 is a game that took me half a year to complete due to its slow points in the game, but one thing that made it really one of my favorite story line games, was its realism. Saying this, i mean that the game itself has evidence around each corner that the lab was in use at one point. The evidence ranges from posters to voices of old scientific testers. All I can say is that this game (especially the ending) is just flat out beautiful. I would pay money just to watch the last five minutes of the game. So in all, this game is worth money and your time if you are into half-life or puzzle games itself. 12/10 would reccomend.
Easily, the best puzzle game of our generation. Very creative and unique of Valve. All Hail Gaben.
Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei!!! O único contra é não ter mais horas de jogo.

Wow. I cant believe that up untill a few weeks ago, I had never played this FANTASTIC game. Portal 2 is one of the best video games ever made and every one on this planet and beyond should play it. THe writting and voice acting is whitty. And the gameplay is slic and challenging!

Jogo simplesmente sensacional! Ainda melhor que o primeiro.
O que eu mais gostei de Portal 2 é a coerência que os desenvolvedores tiveram na criação deste jogo. Na minha opinião, é o que se espera de uma boa continuação de um sucesso. Muitas vezes sabemos que fazem mer** em cotinuações, seja por não inovar nada, ou por não melhorar gráficos, ou por mudar muito o estilo de jogo, enfim. Mas em Portal 2 acertaram na mosca. Fizeram uma continuação que realmente te dá mais do mesmo no sentido que o jogo se mantém fiel a raiz dele, mas também apresenta várias inovações em seus puzzles que te farão ter que pensar de maneira diferente a cada novidade apresentada. Até um pouco antes da metade o jogo parece realmente uma continuação um pouco preguiçosa tanto no gameplay quanto na história, mas quando um certo acontecimento chega o jogo "muda de foco" na trama e vários novos tipos de puzzle são introduzidos, fato que realmente me agradou muito. Até o fim do jogo me diverti muito resolvendo tudo e vendo os diálogos. E ah, fora a melhoria gráfica que também foi muito boa.
Isso tudo sem contar a trilha sonora, o modo cooperativo, modo de criar e jogar em fases criadas, enfim...
Recomendadíssimo, 10/10!
*É o único jogo em que assistir aos créditos é realmente legal.

Easily the best puzzle/platformer ever made. Challenging but not usually frustrating, hysterically funny but still appropriately tense, and creative in its application of the wonderously world-bending portal gun, this is a must-have for, well, everyone. If it weren't for a certain reduction in polish and/or immersiveness in a few segments, it would be near-perfect.

I feel like I'm the only person in the world that doesn't really care for this game.  It just went on and on and on.  The original was great because it was to the point, you vs the game.  Portal 2 forces you to complete the same 4 puzzles over and over just to get a sassy piece of dialog.  If this game was three dollars I would recommend it but otherwise I cannot.  But like I said at the beginning, I'm the only person that doesn't really care for this, so you should probably just get it I guess.

This game is amazingly fun. I love the thinking methods you need to come up with in order to solve each puzzle. Not eveything is straitforward, and there is little to no penelty for getting a puzle wrong. The mutiplayer is robots. Who doesn't like robots? seriously.

It's a shame valve can't count to three, I guess... :D

Portal 2….what can I say about you that will truly do you justice.  To say that as a sequel  Portal 2 is great (and by that I mean really great; one of the best follow ups in gaming history in my humble opinion) is the least of it.  As a platformer/puzzle game, as a sequel, but simply as a game, Portal 2 is ‘all across the board’ a phenomenal achievement! 

It’s easily twice as long as Portal and with more humor to go with that extra length. Co-op missions have also been added for additional gameplay and there is now an even crazier use of physics-based puzzle solving elements thrown into the mix, most notably with the addition of liquids that allow you/other objects to bounce (blue liquid), move faster (orange liquid) and create portals on surfaces you normally couldn’t utilize for that purpose (white liquid) – not gonna go into specifics on that or when that even factors into the game’s campaign but for certain Portal 2 is a wild ride fraught with wacky antics, danger, intrigue and….umm….potatoes (yeah, not gonna go into that either and spoil anything for ya! You’ll just have to find out on your own).  

To sum up my thoughts:  Portal 2……..I love you!!!!
